title: Found this in a logo, been searching all afternoon without sucess... I would be gratefull if someone help
author: reboot2c

comments.content:
MDTA Design/SKYfontThick

Luc Devroye: "MDTA Design, and in some cases MDTA together with Green Dragon, created these fonts, all related to British or Irish TV stations and their logos..."

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/data1_4244.jpg)

Given that the original is for sale on a dubious logo site, I suspect that this is a free font or custom.

Didn't find an exact match, but searching for 'futuristic" "rounded" "minimal" on myfonts.com, I came up with a handful of options, the closest being Future Bugler Bold:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/breauhare/future-bugler/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/breauhare/future-bugler/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/breauhare/future-bugler/")

Thank You both for Your help.  
DPape thats the correct one i found it, SKYfontThick. Thank You very much!
